course_name: Ethical, Policy and Social Implications of Science and Technology
restriction: Must be in the Science, Technology, Ethics and Policy minor
description: Asks students to think about how society should manage complexity, transformation, and uncertainty with an eye on developing a broader sense of ethics and social responsibility. Introduces analytical frameworks, concepts, and data collection techniques that interdisciplinary scholars use to map relationships among science, technology and society and generate important questions about the future of society.
